showcase.name: showcase
showcase.title: Products powered by HumToSong
showcase.description: A glimpse of teams building delightful music discovery.

items.title: SingAlong Helpdesk
items.description: Support agents identify humming from callers in realtime.

items.title: JamClips
items.description: Short-form concert recaps with instant track credits.

items.title: LoopRadio Live
items.description: Radio stations surface current songs for listeners.

items.title: MuseFinder
items.description: Creators tag background music without leaving the editor.

items.title: GrooveLens
items.description: Retail playlists update automatically from in-store hums.

items.title: BeatScout
items.description: A&R teams trace demo references with one click.

items.title: ChorusClass
items.description: Music educators share exercises and find original tracks.

items.title: SessionSync
items.description: Studios log jam sessions and capture song splits instantly.

items.title: Resonate AR
items.description: Immersive exhibits surface track info from visitor humming.
